{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3500868,"name":"Emil","username":"GronkBaby","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/ba8739/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-03T18:54:13.710Z","cooked":"

I think at this point CD is def tired of seeing my username , but here I go asking more.

We are looking for a good, reliable energy chain supplier (if it is in Israel, even better) that teams have used in the past.

A lot of US-based teams use energy chains from Igus.

In the past, they’ve contributed a bag of parts, including small energy chain, to FIRST Choice, but they’re gone now.

Automation Direct has chain 2 day shipping usually.
There is a $50 voucher you can use in your FIRST Dashboard.

We got this one recently:
https://www.automationdirect.com/adc/shopping/catalog/wiring_solutions/dynamic_cable_-z-_hose_management/cable_-z-_hose_drag_chains/cdc-0.7x1.0r1.1n

With Ends:
https://www.automationdirect.com/adc/shopping/catalog/wiring_solutions/dynamic_cable_-z-_hose_management/drag_chain_accessories/cdc-kaz-0.7x1.0

Specs

cdn.automationdirect.com

mp18dragchain.pdf

We like how you can pop it open down the length. They both directions or single directions we well.
